1.title: Be nice to other people
1.content: Having a debate is fine but keep it friendly.

2.title: No self promoting.
2.content: We don't want this server to become full of self promotion spam. If you're unsure if it's ok to share something, contact a moderator.

3.title: No Piracy
3.content: We don't support piracy in this server. This includes anything from Blawar (tinfoil, etc) or SX OS.

4.title: Don't randomly ping people
4.content: We want to help you, but some of us are hard at work or at school. Please only ping an online mod when there's someone breaking the rules. If there's no online moderators and there's an emergency such as a raid, you may ping the entire moderator role.

5.title: Direct Messages & Moderators
5.content: Please refrain from sending a Direct Message to a moderator unless prompted. Sending a DM for support reasons may result in a warn.

6.title: No NSFW/L
6.content: We do not want any NSFW stuff here. This also applies to custom switch themes.

7.title: No Mini-Modding
7.content: We have chosen the people that we feel should moderate. If someone is breaking a rule, please mention an online/active moderator.

8.title: Chat in the correct channel
8.content: We love having you talk, but please make sure it's in the correct channel. We have channels to try to keep things neat.
